column4: hi :) I have a really big problem.. everytime I try to run synaptic, update manager, and apps that requires password I get prompted for password and gets the message: "Failed to run /usr/bin/update-manager: Child terminated with 1 status" after ive entered the password.. :S why is this happening? I installed the hoary rc 10 minutes ago...
i start synaptic from a terminal and have only seen that msg when starting from the gnome pulldown menu
I cant run Root terminal either :s Gets the msg "Failed to run /usr/bin/x-terminal-emulator: Child terminated with 1 status"
slask3n is not in the sudoers file.  This incident will be reported.
